system.description: At 3rd level when you select this archetype, you gain proficiency with the Arcana skill. If you are already proficient, you gain an expertise die. You also become proficient with the Biting Zephyr combat tradition and learn a Biting Zephyr maneuver you qualify for. It does not count against your maneuvers known. If you are already proficient with Biting Zephyr, you may choose another combat tradition available to the ranger class in its place.
